metadata.title: Tallaby.com – Your Everything Store
metadata.description: Shop millions of products at Tallaby.com — from fashion and electronics to home, beauty, and more. Fast delivery, great prices, and trusted sellers.
metadata.keywords: tallaby, online shopping, ecommerce, amazon alternative, buy online, electronics, fashion, beauty, home essentials
metadata.ogDescription: Discover endless shopping on Tallaby.com – electronics, fashion, home, beauty, and more. Worldwide delivery, secure checkout, and trusted sellers.
metadata.twitterDescription: Tallaby.com brings you Amazon-like shopping with millions of products, great prices, and secure delivery.

product.beTheFirst: Be the first to review this product

product.signInToAskQuestion: Sign In to Ask a Question
product.leaveReviewDescription: You can only review products you've purchased. Share your experience with the product, the vendor, and the delivery.
product.leaveReviewNote: Note: Reviews can be submitted after your order is marked as delivered.
product.commentMaxLength: Comment must be less than 1000 characters
product.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

profile.toCompleteYourProfile: To complete your profile, please fill in the following fields:
profile.updatePersonalDetails: Update your personal details and preferences
profile.receiveMarketingEmailsDescription: Receive emails about new products and special offers
profile.referFriendsDescription: Refer friends and get rewarded! Share your code or enter a friend's code.
profile.generateReferralCodeDescription: Generate your referral code to share with friends
profile.enterFriendReferralCode: Enter a friend's referral code to apply it
profile.youHaveAlreadyApplied: You have already applied a referral code.

orders.noOrders: You haven't placed any orders yet

orders.thankYouForPurchase: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been successfully placed.
orders.orderProcessingDescription: We'll prepare your order for shipment days.
orders.shippingNotificationDescription: You'll receive an email with tracking information once your order ships.
orders.deliveryDescription: Your order will be delivered to the address provided.

home.title: Tallaby.com – Your Everything Store
home.description: Shop millions of products at Tallaby.com — from fashion and electronics to home, beauty, and more. Fast delivery, great prices, and trusted sellers.
home.heroBannerText: GET FREE DELIVERY ON YOUR FIRST ORDER NOW
home.heroHeadline: Get free delivery on your first order
home.heroDescription: Shop from hundreds of products across accessories, personal care, fashion and more.. Fast delivery, great prices, and trusted sellers.

products.title: All Products | Shop Online | Tallaby.com
products.description: Browse thousands of products across all categories on Tallaby.com. Find electronics, fashion, home essentials, beauty products and more with fast shipping.

about.title: About Us | Tallaby.com
about.description: Learn about Tallaby.com's mission to connect customers with quality products from trusted vendors worldwide. Discover our story, values, and commitment to exceptional service.

contact.title: Contact Us | Tallaby.com
contact.description: Get in touch with Tallaby.com customer support. We're here to help with orders, products, returns, and any questions. Multiple contact methods available.

contactPage.heroDescription: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactPage.subject: Subject
contactPage.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contactPage.requestCallDescription: Check this box if you'd like us to call you back by voice call

auth.title: Sign In | Tallaby.com
auth.description: Sign in to your Tallaby.com account or create a new one to start shopping with us. Secure authentication for your e-commerce experience.

category.shopDescription: Shop {category} products on Tallaby.com. {count} available with fast shipping and great prices.

footer.description: Your comprehensive destination for online shopping. We offer you a wide range of products from all categories to meet all your needs.

notFound.sorryNotFound: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

onboarding.createVendorAccount: Create your vendor account and start selling on our platform.

onboarding.provideBusinessLegalAddress: Provide your business legal address and registration details
onboarding.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create a seller account

onboarding.fileSizeMustBeLess: File size must be less than 5MB
onboarding.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

toast.contactMessageSentSuccessfully: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!

installApp.installAppError:
To install the app:

1. Tap the Share icon
2. Choose "Add to Home Screen"
